docs.snippet: China expects strong pressure to win medals at next month's Olympics in Rio de Janeiro from teams which have begun to better challenge its dominance in sports like badminton, state media said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: China expects strong pressure to win medals at next month's Olympics in Rio de Janeiro from teams which have begun to better challenge its dominance in sports like badminton, state media said on Tuesday.

headline.main: China Says Expects Tough Challenge for Medals at Rio
headline.print_headline: China Says Expects Tough Challenge for Medals at Rio

docs.snippet: Tennis accounted for the majority of suspicious betting activity flagged up by the European Sports Security Association (ESSA) with 34 incidents in the second quarter of 2016....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tennis accounted for the majority of suspicious betting activity flagged up by the European Sports Security Association (ESSA) with 34 incidents in the second quarter of 2016.

headline.main: Tennis Tops ESSA Table for Suspicious Betting
headline.print_headline: Tennis Tops ESSA Table for Suspicious Betting

docs.snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin responded unusually quickly to a World Anti-Doping Agency report that accused his government of running a covert doping program for the country’s Olympians....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin responded unusually quickly to a World Anti-Doping Agency report that accused his government of running a covert doping program for the country’s Olympians.
docs.abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin reacts within hours to release of damaging report by World Anti-Doping Agency detailing Russian state-sponsored doping program for Olympic athletes; calls report politicized and says all those mentioned in report would be suspended.

headline.main: Putin’s Swift Reaction to Doping Report Blames Anti-Russian Politics
headline.print_headline: Putin Cites Politics in Answer to Report

byline.contributor: Ivan Nechepurenko and Oleg Matsnev contributed reporting.

docs.snippet: While training with the United States basketball team that will be headed to the Rio Olympics, Anthony spoke about his activism against gun violence....
docs.lead_paragraph: While training with the United States basketball team that will be headed to the Rio Olympics, Anthony spoke about his activism against gun violence.
docs.abstract: New York Knicks star Carmelo Anthony says he has received favorable response to his call for unity on social media in wake of fatal police shootings of black men and attacks on police in Dallas; Anthony, who is preparing for Olympic Games in Brazil, has shown growing interest in social activism and has called on fellow stars to use their influence to bring about change.

headline.main: Carmelo Anthony Is Using His Voice and Olympic Platform for Social Change
headline.print_headline: Using His Voice to Promote Action

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dallas, Tex, Shooting of Police Officers (2016)

docs.snippet: Turkey purged its police on Monday after rounding up thousands of soldiers in the wake of a failed military coup, and said it could reconsider its friendship with the United States unless Washington hands over a cleric Ankara blames for the putsch...
docs.lead_paragraph: Turkey purged its police on Monday after rounding up thousands of soldiers in the wake of a failed military coup, and said it could reconsider its friendship with the United States unless Washington hands over a cleric Ankara blames for the putsch.

headline.main: Turkey Widens Post-Coup Purge, Demands U.S. Hand Over Cleric
headline.print_headline: Turkey Widens Post-Coup Purge, Demands U.S. Hand Over Cleric

docs.snippet: The Hollywood stuntman doesn't want to follow in his idol's footsteps so much as rocket above them — over a gaping canyon, no less....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Hollywood stuntman doesn't want to follow in his idol's footsteps so much as rocket above them — over a gaping canyon, no less.

headline.main: Stuntman to Attempt Knievel's Launch Over Snake River Canyon
headline.print_headline: Stuntman to Attempt Knievel's Launch Over Snake River Canyon
